website_summaries.verdict: The Dell XPS 13 Touch (9333) is a compact touch-screen ultrabook made with premium materials like carbon fiber and Gorilla Glass. It's an excellent travel companion, but strictly luxury class.
pros: The Dell XPS 13 Touch is a compact touch-screen ultrabook made with premium materials like carbon fiber and Gorilla Glass
It's an excellent travel companion, but strictly luxury class

customer_reviews.title: Laptop is good but charger died after a few weeks :(((((
customer_reviews.text: I had to update the review because my charger died after just few weeks. The laptop is really good and light but if the charger died after just few weeks then I hope my laptop will be not the same. You can buy a new charger for 20ish pounds just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great fast laptop and screen. Fried motherboard after 13 months. Unusable trackerpad.
customer_reviews.text: A great looking laptop. Amazing screen, fast. The tracker pad is almost unusable at times so I always needed a mouse. 13 months after purchase and 1 month after the warranty ended the machine will not start. Suspect that the internal power has blown and potentially take then motherboard with it. I will update if this is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine - performs as good as it looks and the service was great too
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Really fast. The webcam is in a weird position and the wi-fi is creating issues. However, the size and weight is perfect and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Spot on, all round gem
customer_reviews.text: One week in and I am still utterly blown away by this laptop. Costs a few bob, but I cannot fault it, and for once for a new laptop it is not pre-loaded with unwanted manufacturer software, kudos to Dell. Battery life, compact size and lightness were the main reasons I chose it and all three aspects are great. I never thought that i would actually find the touchscreen useful, proven wrong on that front, it makes complete sense every now and again. Even other little things, like the fact it is not covered in those silly little stickers, just one intel one are delightful. All round great product.
customer_reviews.author: lukeshep

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit. Battery life far better than anything else I have used. Intel i7 processor very quick and allied with SSD makes for a user friendly laptop than will handle anything you throw at it. Slimline case with brushed aluminium finish doesn't hurt the feel good factor either but does limit the ports available (only one usb). Only downside was windows 8.1 but have taken free upgrade? to 10 and time will tell if Microsoft stick to their pledge. Display on this laptop is as good if not better than a retina display and for the money you get much better hardware than anything you can get from apple. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. MCGUINNESS

customer_reviews.title: Faulty towers
customer_reviews.text: Delivered item did not have the wifi driver nor the hard-disk installed. I've sent it back and received a new one. That one again had no hard drive installed and the spacebar did not work. customer service was unhelpful and did not resolve problem. I have sent it back now never to buy Dell again!
customer_reviews.author: Karlo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop but having continual problems with track-pad. Also US keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Tony W.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars laptop with three stars battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very nice maybe more than nice laptop. First - design : five stars, excellent quality and materials very compact size and weight for 13 inch laptop. Performance: five stars as expected with this specification no separate graphic card but average standard for this size . Screen: five stars touch screen I can`t find any problems, I like it. Battery life: three stars average. I can not understand 15 hours from the advertisement by Dell, maybe if you put to the sleep mode. I think 5 hours max. with normal ( for me) performance and usage. This is understandable with so beautiful screen. Value for money: four stars, little bit pricy at the moment. Summary: 4 stars. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Georg Kleger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looks, very stylish. Excellent product. We're very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews. The product is as described. Turned it on the first time. Went through the steps of activating Windows etc and after about 2 hours switched it off. Then when turned on the 2nd time, it did not work! Nothing happened after switching it on for the 2nd time. Not sure what was going on? Was it just a faulty piece? The power cord also was a bit of a hit and miss!! Sent it back promptly. Not sure if I should buy another one or go for something else....
customer_reviews.author: Roop Kishen

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good laptop. There were a lot of reports of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good laptop. There were a lot of reports of high fan noise, heat, etc. but with the newest BIOS A03 (as of May 2015) the thermal management seems to have stabilized and the fan does not turn on unless there are heavy tasks, and when these tasks stop the fan will stop. So with this one problem removed, it's all good. Fantastically good screen. Touchscreen works as well as Win 8.1 supports. The very high screen resolution might make some programs unusable, but in that case you just tune to half resolution for those programs. Review based on a machine from work.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop after a lot of research but cannot believe how bad it is. I have spent hours trying to make it run faster but it's truly terrible. It's only a few months old but has already had the bsod and multiple updates that make it worse each time. My last £300 toshiba was way better. I'm going to have to live with this until I can afford a Mac. Seriously. Don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
